Univariate TS Models (ARIMA/SARIMA)

Code 
### ============================================================
### LOAD LIBRARIES
### ============================================================
library(quantmod)
library(tidyverse)
library(zoo)
library(forecast)
library(tseries)
library(ggplot2)

cat("Loading financial data...\n")
Loading financial data...
Code 
start_date <- as.Date("2019-01-01")
end_date   <- as.Date("2025-09-18")

load_fred_data <- function(symbol, start, end) {
  tryCatch({
    getSymbols(symbol, src = "FRED", from = start, to = end,
               auto.assign = FALSE)
  }, error = function(e) {
    cat(sprintf("Warning: Could not load %s\n", symbol))
    return(NULL)
  })
}

### ============================================================
### LOAD DATA
### ============================================================
sp500_data   <- load_fred_data("SP500",     start_date, end_date)
vix_data     <- load_fred_data("VIXCLS",    start_date, end_date)
btc_data     <- load_fred_data("CBBTCUSD",  start_date, end_date)
nasdaq_data  <- load_fred_data("NASDAQCOM", start_date, end_date)
usd_data     <- load_fred_data("DTWEXBGS",  start_date, end_date)

merge_list <- list(
  SP500   = sp500_data,
  VIX     = vix_data,
  Bitcoin = btc_data,
  NASDAQ  = nasdaq_data,
  USD     = usd_data
)

merge_list <- merge_list[!sapply(merge_list, is.null)]

price_zoo <- do.call(merge.zoo, merge_list)

price_data <- fortify.zoo(price_zoo)
colnames(price_data) <- c("Date", names(merge_list))
price_data <- price_data |> na.omit()

cat("Final merged dataset:\n")
Final merged dataset:
Code 
cat(sprintf("Rows: %d\n", nrow(price_data)))
Rows: 1668
Code 
cat(sprintf("Columns: %s\n", paste(colnames(price_data), collapse=", ")))
Columns: Date, SP500, VIX, Bitcoin, NASDAQ, USD
Code 
### ============================================================
### RETURNS
### ============================================================
returns <- price_data |>
  arrange(Date) |>
  mutate(
    SP500_ret   = c(NA, diff(log(SP500))),
    VIX_ret     = c(NA, diff(log(VIX))),
    Bitcoin_ret = c(NA, diff(log(Bitcoin))),
    NASDAQ_ret  = c(NA, diff(log(NASDAQ))),
    USD_ret     = c(NA, diff(log(USD)))
  ) |>
  na.omit()

HELPER FUNCTIONS

Code 
### ============================================================
### BASIC GETTERS
### ============================================================
get_series <- function(asset) price_data[[asset]]

get_diff_series <- function(asset) {
  diff(log(price_data[[asset]])) |> na.omit()
}

### ============================================================
### ORIGINAL + DIFF PLOT
### ============================================================
plot_original_and_diff <- function(asset) {
  par(mfrow=c(2,1))
  plot(price_data$Date, price_data[[asset]], type="l",
       main=paste(asset, "- Original"), col="steelblue")
  plot(get_diff_series(asset), type="l",
       main=paste(asset, "- First Difference"), col="red")
  par(mfrow=c(1,1))
}

### ============================================================
### ACF & PACF
### ============================================================
plot_acf_pacf <- function(asset) {
  series <- get_diff_series(asset)
  par(mfrow=c(1,2))
  acf(series, main=paste(asset, "- ACF"))
  pacf(series, main=paste(asset, "- PACF"))
  par(mfrow=c(1,1))
}

### ============================================================
### STATIONARITY
### ============================================================
run_stationarity <- function(asset) {
  print(adf.test(get_diff_series(asset)))
}

### ============================================================
### ARIMA FITTING
### ============================================================
run_arima_models <- function(asset) {
  series <- get_diff_series(asset)
  fit <- auto.arima(series)
  print(fit)
}

run_arima_diagnostics <- function(asset) {
  series <- get_diff_series(asset)
  fit <- auto.arima(series)
  tsdiag(fit)
}

forecast_arima_asset <- function(asset) {
  series <- get_diff_series(asset)
  fit <- auto.arima(series)
  plot(forecast(fit, h=30))
}

### ============================================================
### BENCHMARKS
### ============================================================
compare_benchmarks <- function(asset) {
  series <- get_diff_series(asset)
  naive_f <- naive(series, h=30)
  snaive_f <- snaive(series, h=30)
  auto_f <- forecast(auto.arima(series), h=30)
  list(naive=naive_f, snaive=snaive_f, arima=auto_f)
}

### ============================================================
### SARIMA
### ============================================================
run_sarima_models <- function(asset) {
  series <- get_diff_series(asset)
  fit <- auto.arima(series, seasonal=TRUE)
  print(fit)
}

forecast_sarima_asset <- function(asset) {
  series <- get_diff_series(asset)
  fit <- auto.arima(series, seasonal=TRUE)
  plot(forecast(fit, h=30))
}

### ============================================================
### SEASONALITY
### ============================================================
seasonality_analysis <- function(asset) {
  series <- ts(get_diff_series(asset), frequency = 365)
  plot(stl(series, "periodic"))
}

### ============================================================
### CROSS VALIDATION
### ============================================================
cross_validate_sarima <- function(asset) {
  series <- ts(get_diff_series(asset))
  e <- tsCV(series,
            forecastfunction=function(y,h){forecast(auto.arima(y),h=h)},
            h=1)
  mean(e^2, na.rm=TRUE)
}

alternative hypothesis: stationary
